attributes.action: Preventing politicians receiving heating allowances and other expenses.
attributes.additional_details: It's been well stated that many pensioners are going to face real hardships, and having to choose between heating or eating.
attributes.background: Many pensioners have been stripped of the heating allowance. It needs to be rienstatated.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk

You may also like to sign the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700074
